data.title: Who is a “corresponding or sole author?”
data.text: “Corresponding author” refers to the author responsible for communication with the publisher; “sole author” applies to articles that only have one author. If an article has only one author who is a full time JH faculty member or the corresponding author of an article is a full-time JH faculty member, then the article needs to be made openly available by that faculty member through one of the methods described in the policy.
